messages.title: 5 THINGS TO REMEMBER ABOUT VOTING
messages.content: Polling stations are open from 7am to 10pm. You do not need your polling card to vote. If you cannot get to the polling station on the day, you must apply for an emergency proxy vote by 5pm on 8 June.

mentions.tacticalSituation: History shows one candidate cannot win. Tactical voting can help.

issues.brexitEurope: IN/OUT...STUCK IN/OUT? – Remember when we voted to leave the EU…Why hasn't it happened yet?

images.caption: Re-elect Vernon on 8 June. Your local champion.

leaflet.additionalNotes: This Thursday 8 June you have a choice between a local champion, your local Vernon, or a Tory outsider.
